{"id":1521380131,"question_id":3691,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737916492,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521380131/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Columns Strictly Increasing","memory":"28.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperations(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int m = grid.size();\n        int n = grid[0].size();\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<m-1; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {\n                int prev = grid[i+1][j];\n                grid[i+1][j] = max(grid[i+1][j], grid[i][j]+1);\n                ret += grid[i+1][j] - prev;\n            };\n        };\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-columns-strictly-increasing","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
